description:
Seth is a boy who lives in the remote village of Pompo Hills. He spends his days training to be a great sorcerer, but he`s always messing up. After angering the villagers yet again by letting valuable livestock escape from a ranch, his guardian, Alma, gives him a harsh scolding. Then, one day, a Nemesis egg falls from the sky. Only sorcerers can defeat the Nemesis, so Seth makes up his mind to fight the beast in Alma`s absence, but his foe is much stronger than he expected...
Source: crunchyroll
